Name: Bitter Grapefruit
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Grapefruit influenced and Negroni in style.
History: Discovered in 2007 at Public Restaurant, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Bitter Grapefruit contains 186 calories
